title: Weekend Classics Radio Show | Aarati Mukherjee Bengali Special | Hd Songs Jukebox
description:
This WEEKEND CLASSIC RADIO SHOW presents 14 Bengali Super Hit songs of the very popular artiste ARATI MUKHERJEE with many unknown stories about the artiste.  These songs are with various moods and has been rendered by Arati Mukherjee with an inimitable style of singing. Presenter is RJ Souvik Saha.

Listen and Enjoy!!! Do not forget to "Subscribe" to our channel and leave a chance to get more nostalgic with memories.

01:03 Takhon Tomar Ekush Bachhar
05:28 Banya Banya E Aranya
09:47 Lajja , Mori Mori Eki Lajja
14:17 Ami Miss Calcutta
18:20 Jale Nebo Na
22:28 Ki Kshati Chhelebeler (Ami Bujhi Na)
26:41 Aaynate Mukh Dekhbo Na
30:44 Ei Mom Jochhonay Ango Bhijiye
34:51 Ogo Moner Duyare Danriye Theko Na
38:44 Ek Baishakhe Dekha Holo Dujanay
43:07 Madhobi Modhupey Holo Mitali
47:20 Ei Akash Natun Batas Natun
50:47 Bou Katha Kao
54:31 O Babumashai
